metadata.title: Coello Help Centre
metadata.description: Explore delivery timelines, returns, concierge contact options, and more inside the Coello help centre.

hero.title: Welcome to the Coello Help Centre
hero.description: From sleeve fit to customs duties, we cover every detail so you can focus on feeling incredible.

introCard.title: Concierge-crafted support
introCard.description: Our help hub mirrors the premium experience in our flagship stores—curated, proactive, and multilingual-ready. Start with the tiles below or connect with our concierge team any time.

quickLinks.title: Find your answer fast
quickLinks.description: Browse our curated FAQ updated weekly by the concierge desk.

quickLinks.title: Delivery timelines
quickLinks.description: See shipping cut-offs, courier partners, and international ETAs.

quickLinks.title: Returns & exchanges
quickLinks.description: Review our 30-day promise and start a size swap in minutes.

quickLinks.title: International orders
quickLinks.description: Understand duties, currency support, and customs tracking.

contactCard.title: Need a human right now?
contactCard.description: Our concierge stylists respond in under two minutes between 8am and midnight GMT.
